cause.description:
Brady Wroe, the charming little scamp was promised a lapdance by a woman for his graduation present. It's going to fucking happen. I don't care if we have to go to Lookers, it'll happen. I'd rather not have to spend money on this but if I have to, it shall be in the form of a fundraiser.
1. Brady Wroe needs a lapdance
2. Promises should always be kept, especially those involving eroticism
3. It's the right thing to do
cause.mission: Get Brady Wroe a lapdance of the female variety as his graduation present as was promised him.
cause.name: Get Brady a lapdance
